column1: joke
Joke
Why did Frank bring a ladder to the bar? He heard the drinks were on the house!
What do you call Ale when she’s fixing dinner and solving math homework at the same time? A superhero in an apron!
Why did Kevin always win hide-and-seek? Because Chris kept yelling, ‘I’m over here!’
How does Chris like his eggs? Egg-cited!
Frank said, ‘I’m reading a book about anti-gravity.’ It’s impossible to put down!
Ale asked, ‘Why did the tomato turn red?’ Because it saw the salad dressing!
Kevin told Chris, ‘You’re like a WiFi signal.’ Chris said, ‘Why?’ Kevin said, ‘Because I can’t connect with you!’
Why did Chris bring a spoon to the baseball game? In case he needed to stir up some trouble!
Frank tried to write a joke about clocks… but it was too tick-tock.
Ale said, ‘I’m not lazy—I’m in energy-saving mode!’
Why did Kevin put his homework in the freezer? He wanted to chill before turning it in!
Chris asked, ‘What do you call a penguin in the desert?’ Lost!
Frank’s favorite type of music? Wrap music!
Ale told Kevin, ‘You’re not short—you’re concentrated awesome!’
Why did Chris take a ruler to bed? To see how long he slept!
Kevin said, ‘I’m friends with 25 letters of the alphabet. I don’t know Y.’
Frank asked, ‘Why don’t skeletons fight each other?’ They don’t have the guts!
Ale said, ‘I told my plants a joke. Now they’re growing leaves from laughing!’
Why did Chris get an A in art? Because he drew a blank!
Kevin told Frank, ‘You’re like a parking ticket.’ Frank said, ‘Why?’ Kevin said, ‘Because you’ve got ‘fine’ written all over you!’
What did Ale say when Chris asked for a snack at 8 p.m.? ‘That’s not a snack—that’s a breakfast reservation!’
Frank tried to catch fog… but he mist!
Why did Kevin bring a pencil to the beach? In case he needed to draw a line in the sand!
Chris asked, ‘What do you call a bear with no teeth?’ A gummy bear!
Ale said, ‘I’m not arguing—I’m just explaining why I’m right!’
Why did Frank put his money in the blender? He wanted to make liquid assets!
Kevin told Chris, ‘You’re like my phone battery.’ Chris said, ‘Why?’ Kevin said, ‘Because you drain me!’
What did Chris say when he saw a ghost? ‘Boo-tiful!’
Frank asked, ‘Why did the scarecrow win an award?’ Because he was outstanding in his field!
Ale said, ‘I’m not late—I’m fashionably on Frank-time!’
Why did Kevin take a bath with his rubber ducky? To quack the stress away!
Chris asked, ‘What do you call cheese that isn’t yours?’ Nacho cheese!
Frank said, ‘I used to hate facial hair… but then it grew on me!’
Ale told Kevin, ‘You’re not messy—you’re creatively organized!’
Why did Chris bring a map to school? He didn’t want to get lost in thought!
Kevin said, ‘I’m not short—I’m fun-sized!’
Frank asked, ‘What do you call a fake noodle?’ An impasta!
Ale said, ‘I’m not bossy—I just have better ideas!’
Why did Chris put his shoes in the fridge? He wanted to have cool feet!
Kevin told Frank, ‘You’re like a dictionary.’ Frank said, ‘Why?’ Kevin said, ‘Because you add meaning to my life!’
What did Ale say when Chris spilled milk? ‘Don’t cry over spilled milk… but please clean it up!’
Frank tried to write a joke about glue… but it stuck in his head!
Why did Kevin bring a flashlight to the art class? He wanted to brighten up his ideas!
Chris asked, ‘What do you call a sleeping bull?’ A bulldozer!
Ale said, ‘I’m not old—I’m vintage!’
Frank asked, ‘Why did the math book look sad?’ Because it had too many problems!
Kevin told Chris, ‘You’re like a cloud.’ Chris said, ‘Why?’ Kevin said, ‘Because you rain on my parade!’
What did Chris say when he found a dollar? ‘This is my lucky day!’
Ale said, ‘I’m not tired—I’m just recharging my mom batteries!’
Why did Frank bring a pencil to the BBQ? To draw the line at burnt hot dogs!
Kevin asked, ‘What do you call a dinosaur with an extensive vocabulary?’ A thesaurus!
Chris said, ‘I’m not clumsy—I’m just gravity’s best friend!’
Frank told Ale, ‘You’re like WiFi.’ Ale said, ‘Why?’ Frank said, ‘Because I can’t imagine life without you!’
Why did Ale put her phone in the oven? She wanted to bake a call!
Kevin said, ‘I’m not procrastinating—I’m doing research on deadlines!’
Chris asked, ‘What do you call a cow with no legs?’ Ground beef!
Frank said, ‘I’m not snoring—I’m dreaming loudly!’
Ale told Kevin, ‘You’re not stubborn—you’re passionately persistent!’
Why did Chris bring a broom to the party? To sweep everyone off their feet!
Kevin asked, ‘What do you call a fish wearing a bowtie?’ Sofishticated!
Frank said, ‘I’m not bald—I’m aerodynamic!’
Ale asked, ‘Why did the cookie go to the doctor?’ Because it felt crumbly!
Why did Kevin put his shoes on the shelf? To step up his game!
Chris said, ‘I’m not small—I’m compact and efficient!’
Frank told Chris, ‘You’re like a light switch.’ Chris said, ‘Why?’ Frank said, ‘Because you brighten up the room!’
Ale said, ‘I’m not forgetful—I’m just making room for important things!’
Why did Kevin bring a camera to the zoo? To capture the moment… and the monkeys!
Chris asked, ‘What do you call a dog that does magic tricks?’ A labracadabrador!
Frank said, ‘I’m not cheap—I’m budget-conscious!’
Ale told Kevin, ‘You’re not loud—you’re enthusiastically expressive!’
Why did Chris put his homework in the oven? He wanted to bake a grade!
Kevin said, ‘I’m not lazy—I’m on energy-saving mode like Mom!’
Frank asked, ‘What do you call a bear in the rain?’ A drizzly bear!
Ale said, ‘I’m not late—I’m just giving everyone extra time to miss me!’
Why did Kevin bring a pillow to school? For nap-tastic ideas!
Chris asked, ‘What do you call a pig that knows karate?’ A pork chop!
Frank told Ale, ‘You’re like a fine wine.’ Ale said, ‘Why?’ Frank said, ‘Because you get better with time!’
Why did Ale put her keys in the freezer? To chill out before driving!
Kevin said, ‘I’m not short—I’m vertically challenged!’
Chris said, ‘I’m not silly—I’m joyfully spontaneous!’
Frank asked, ‘Why did the bicycle fall over?’ Because it was two-tired!
Ale told Chris, ‘You’re not messy—you’re creatively chaotic!’
Why did Kevin bring a compass to the playground? To find his direction in life!
Chris asked, ‘What do you call a cat that loves to bowl?’ An alley cat!
Frank said, ‘I’m not old—I’m classic!’
Ale said, ‘I’m not strict—I’m lovingly firm!’
Why did Chris put his socks in the blender? He wanted to make smooth feet!
Kevin told Frank, ‘You’re like a superhero.’ Frank said, ‘Why?’ Kevin said, ‘Because you always save the day… and the leftovers!’
What did Ale say when Kevin asked for a third cookie? ‘That’s the last one… until tomorrow!’
Frank tried to tell a joke about elevators… but it was too uplifting!
Why did Kevin bring a blanket to the soccer game? To cover his bases!
Chris asked, ‘What do you call a snowman in July?’ A puddle!
Ale said, ‘I’m not tired—I’m just recharging for round two!’
Frank told Chris, ‘You’re like a star.’ Chris said, ‘Why?’ Frank said, ‘Because you shine even on cloudy days!’
Why did Ale put her coffee in the garden? To grow a buzz!
Kevin said, ‘I’m not stubborn—I’m confidently decisive!’
Chris asked, ‘What do you call a frog that’s a detective?’ Sherlock Homes!
Frank said, ‘I’m not snoring—I’m practicing my lion impression!’
Ale told Kevin, ‘You’re not loud—you’re audibly awesome!’
Why did Chris bring a ladder to school? To reach new heights… and the top shelf of his locker!
Why did Frank always win at hide-and-seek? Because Ale kept saying, ‘He’s in the garage!’
Ale told Chris, ‘You’re not slow—you’re just savoring life one step at a time!’
Kevin asked Chris, ‘Why did the math book look so sad?’ Chris said, ‘I don’t know.’ Kevin said, ‘Because it had too many problems!’
Frank said, ‘I’m not old—I’m retro!’
What did Ale say when Kevin spilled juice? ‘That’s not a spill—that’s a liquid opportunity to learn!’

Frank told Ale, ‘You’re like WiFi.’ Ale said, ‘Why?’ Frank said, ‘Because I feel lost without you!’

Ale said, ‘I’m not yelling—I’m using my outdoor voice indoors!’

Frank said, ‘I’m not snoring—I’m practicing my bear impression!’
Ale told Chris, ‘You’re not messy—you’re creatively expressive!’

Chris asked, ‘What do you call a sleeping dinosaur?’ A dino-snore!
Why did Frank bring a pencil to the kitchen? To draw the line at burnt toast!
